effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. Other Pokémon’s abilities cannot activate in response to this move. In particular, it hits through disguise

effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts regular damage. Other Pokémon’s abilities cannot activate in response to this move. In particular, it hits through disguise

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user emits a sinister ray to attack the target. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.
